description:
A slim version of the original [Desk](/lean/desk) that works as a space efficient work station or meeting table.

Available in a range of lengths, it features our modular cable tray covers, which can be chosen from an expanding range: from plain cover, desk tidy or mobile & tablet holder to post organiser, drinks holder or even a bespoke CNC-cut LED light fitting.

*Note: Please note that In this case, the cable covers will come within the same material than the rest of the desk as cut on the same sheet of wood. You can visit our [FAQ page](/faq) for more info.*
name: Slim Desk
